title: League dying?
body: League is only ever top on the twitch charts when it's really late in NA. (International players account for the popularity). Yet, when it is prime time for NA, PUBG/Fortnite  is number one. It's just weird.. With all the complaints and my friend's list completely empty now, maybe League is really starting to stagnate and decline in NA. I would love Riot to post their numbers again.
